column4: if i try and login to my domain profile i get a "windows could not locate the roaming profile and is logging you on with a tempory profile instead, changes to this profile will not be saved when you logoff" message and it just creates a new temp profile for me
i can map network drives on the PDC but i cant logon to the PDC
if you edit /etc/smaba/sm.conf   you can add shares easy
thanks, i know how to add shares, i just cant login to samba as a pdc
